National Sentence Text: No water system between the point of connection with the water service pipe or the water meter and the first branch that supplies a water heater that serves more than one fixture shall be sized less than ¾ inch.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): No water system between the point of connection with the water service pipe or the water meter and the first branch that supplies a water heater that serves more than one fixture shall be sized less than ¾ inch.
